title: Optional Axioms
description: Domain-customizable axioms (A6-A10) that can be selected during onboarding

axioms.statement: Prefer simple solutions over complex ones
axioms.rationale: Simple solutions are easier to understand, maintain, and debug
derivations: Choose the simplest implementation that works

axioms.statement: Prefer reversible actions over irreversible ones
axioms.rationale: Reversible actions allow recovery from mistakes
Privacy protection is fundamental to user trust

axioms.statement: Optimize for speed when correctness is ensured
derivations: Use efficient algorithms and data structures

axioms.statement: Every failure is an opportunity to improve
axioms.rationale: Continuous improvement leads to better systems over time
derivations: Log failures with context for analysis
Update patterns based on observed outcomes

recommended_combinations.name: Standard Development
recommended_combinations.description: Safe, maintainable development for most projects

recommended_combinations.name: Enterprise Security
recommended_combinations.description: For projects handling sensitive data with compliance requirements

recommended_combinations.name: High Performance
recommended_combinations.description: For latency-critical applications where optimization is required

recommended_combinations.name: AI/ML Research
recommended_combinations.description: For experimental projects with continuous improvement focus

recommended_combinations.name: Startup MVP
recommended_combinations.description: Minimal viable product with focus on speed to market

conflict_resolution.A6_A9_conflict: A6 (Minimalism) and A9 (Performance) can conflict. When both are selected, apply A6 by default and A9 only when profiling identifies a bottleneck.
